sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { userAPI } from "../services/api" import { BookOpen, Clock, Award, TrendingUp } from "lucide-react" const DashboardPage = () => { const { user } = useAuth() const [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { if (user) { fetchUserDetails() } }, [user]) const fetchUserDetails = async () => { try { const response = await userAPI.getUserById(user.id) setUserDetails(response.data) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching user details:", error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } if (!user) { return (

Please sign in to access your dashboard

Sign In
) } if (loading) { return (

Loading dashboard...

) } const enrolledCourses = userDetails?.enrolledCourses || [] return (

Welcome back, {user.name}!

Continue your learning journey

{user.role === "instructor" && ( Instructor Dashboard )}
{/* Stats Cards */}

Enrolled Courses

{enrolledCourses.length}

Hours Learned

24

Certificates

3

Progress

78%

{/* Enrolled Courses */}

My Courses

{enrolledCourses.length === 0 ? (

No courses enrolled yet

Start learning by enrolling in your first course

Browse Courses
) : (
{enrolledCourses.map((enrollment) => (

{enrollment.courseId.title}

Progress: {enrollment.progress || 0}% {enrollment.courseId.lessonsCount} lessons
Continue Learning
))}
)}
) } export default DashboardPage
